Class FacebookService

FacebookService provides methods to interact with the Facebook Graph API including posting to a user's page and retrieving engagement.

PostAsync(SocialAccount, SocialPost, CancellationToken)

Publishes a post to the Facebook Page associated with the given SocialAccount.
